sentence: The next GOP president, be it Trump 2.0 or Ron DeSantis or whoever, needs to hire slowly and fire quickly.
author: Kurt Schlichter
title: Yawn  Yet Another Never Trump Loser Sucks Up to the Media

sentence: At the end of March, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, a Republican, signed the controversial GOP-backed education bill into law.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Gay Republicans Slam 'Misguided' Attacks on Florida Law, Trans Bills
